values.help: Upper paddle buttons mode.
values.label: Set to Default

items.label: Separate mode (toggle mode)
In pair mode, left side sends on/up commands, right side sends off/down commands

values.help: Lower paddle buttons mode.
values.label: Set to Default

items.label: Separate mode (toggle mode)
In pair mode, left side sends on/up commands, right side sends off/down commands

values.help: LED #1 mode.
values.label: Set to Default (1)

items.label: LED indication is disabled (LED can be controlled by Indicator Command Class Set commands)
LED indicates the status of the corresponding button
LED indicates the status of the corresponding button, with inverted indication
LED indicates the status of corresponding paddle (in pair mode)
LED indicates the status of the corresponding paddle (in pair mode), with inverted indication
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay, with inverted indication
LED show a 5 seconds indication when the corresponding button is pressed

LED indicates the status of the corresponding button, with inverted indication
LED indicates the status of corresponding paddle (in pair mode)
LED indicates the status of the corresponding paddle (in pair mode), with inverted indication
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay
LED indicates the status of the built-in relay, with inverted indication

values.help: 0 - 100 Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is on.
values.label: LED #1 brightness level.

values.help: 0 - 100 Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is on.
values.label: LED #2 brightness level.

values.help: 0 - 100 Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is on.
values.label: LED #3 brightness level.

values.help: 0 - 100 Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is on.
values.label: LED #4 brightness level.

values.help: 0 - 100 Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is off.
values.label: LED #1 off brightness level.

values.help: 0 - 100 Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is off.
values.label: LED #2 off brightness level.

values.help: 0 - 100 Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is off.
values.label: LED #3 off brightness level.

values.help: 0 - 100 Specifies the brightness level of the LED when it is off.
values.label: LED #4 off brightness level.

values.help: Defines the relay mode.
values.label: Relay mode

items.label: Relay is disabled
Relay is controlled by button #1 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is controlled by button #2 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is controlled by button #3 or by lower paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is controlled by button #4 or by lower paddle when pair mode is active
Relay is activated for one second and is controlled by button #1 or by upper paddle when pair mode is active

values.help: Defines the Indicator mode.
values.label: Indicator mode

items.label: Indicator Set level values are only used to control the LED
Indicator Set level values are also used by internal LED activations

values.help: Button #1 will send scene [value], button #2 will send scene [value] + 1, button #3 will send scene [value] + 2, button #4 will send scene [value] + 3. (Default = 1)
values.label: Scene notification offset

items.label: Scene notifications are turned off
Define a value

values.help: Enable/Disable House Cleaning Mode
values.label: Disable House Cleaning Mode

items.label: Enabled
Disabled

values.help:
Byte 1: Enable / Disable 0 = Disabled a When single pressing the button, nodes associated to group 6 wonat be switched. 1 = Enabled a When single pressing the button, nodes associated to group 6 will be switched between the configured upper and lower switch values. (Default) 
			Byte 2: Upper switch value: 0 a 99, 255; When single pressing the button for ON, a Multilevel Switch Set with this value will be send to devices in association group 6. (Default = 255) 
			Byte 3: Lower switch value: 0 - 99; When single pressing the button for OFF, a Multilevel Switch Set with this value will be send to devices in association group 6. (Default = 0) 
			Byte 4: Not used a must be set to 0.
values.label: Multilevel Switch on single press for device 1 (button #1)

values.help:

			Byte 3: Lower switch value: 0 - 99; When single pressing the button for OFF, a Multilevel Switch Set with this value will be send to devices in association group 6. (Default = 0)

values.help: Control of association groups for device 1 (button #1)
values.label: Control of association groups for device 1 (button #1)

items.label: When commands are received by device 1, nodes in the association groups will not be switched, button activations will still send switch values.
When commands are received by device 1, nodes in the association groups will be switched.
